description:
Fescue lawn weed & seed

The Fescue Seed & Weed Kit provides everything you need to grow better grass and kill more weeds in spring and fall.

This easy and effective kit combines durable, drought-tolerant tall fescue seed with iron-powered weed control to eliminate fall weeds fast. Our premium tall fescue blend grows quickly to thicken your lawn, reducing watering needs once established. Dandelion Doom targets broadleaf weeds, helping you achieve a thicker, weed-free lawn. Designed for any cool-season lawn, it's your go-to solution for overseeding and killer weeding.

Sunday is dedicated to creating eco-conscious, effective lawn care solutions that nurture your yard and the world around it.

Kits Benefits

Kits Components

sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
When is the best time to apply this kit?
Ideally in spring or fall when cool-season grasses grow best. For best results, apply seed when temperatures range between 55-75°F and weed control between 50-85°F
What weeds does Dandelion Doom control?
Dandelion Doom effectively targets common broadleaf weeds like dandelions, clovers, chickweed, thistle, creeping charlie, and more. It also controls moss, algae, lichens, and suppresses common lawn diseases like dollar spot, rust and snow mold.
Can I use this kit alongside other Sunday lawn products?
Yes! This kit complements other Sunday lawn and garden products. Allow recommended dry time between liquid applications for best results.
When is it safe for people and pets to go on the lawn after applying the kit?
Weed control: Safe to return after weed control products dry fully.
Grass seed: limit traffic on newly seeded areas until the grass is established.
When will I see results?
Weed control: Visible results in a few hours to a few days.
Grass seed: Germination in 6-12 days, depending on moisture and temperatures.
Sunday Grass Seed Instructions
Step-by-step instructions on how to seed Sunday's premium cool-season grass seed for a thicker, climate-resilient, and weed-free lawn.
